name: GCMinimal
description:
More compact rendering of Geocaching.com. Features:
  • difficulty, terrain, size and favorites are on the same line;
  • favorite points have a flatter look;
  • gray boxes are replaced by white boxes;
  • all warnings are removed;
  • printing box and waypoint downloads are hidden (please contact me if you actually use those, I'll add a setting);
  • users' stats are now next to the avatars rather than below (mostly to save space on short logs);
  • link to view logs is hidden;
  • tables no longer have borders;
additional_info:
28/09/2018 - Fixed a few broken rules
23/08/2017 - Major rewrite due to GC style change
18/05/2017 - Fix navigation links background on new dashboard page
20/02/2017 - Fixed hidden link for archived caches in field notes
23/08/2016 - Fixed profile icon appearing over the search filter overlay
13/07/2016 - Fixed header after geocaching.com update
03/06/2016 - Fixed message center banner issue / fix blog
15/04/2016 - Remove downtime warning banner
03/02/2016 - Alternate logbook color (gray / white)
15/01/2016 - Fix header in other views
12/01/2016 - Fix header in map view
04/01/2016 - Fix the "View logbook" page
24/11/2015 - Added support of the gift banner
